content: Rui Xing is currently working as a research assistant at Beihang University. Before this, he studied at Beihang University under the supervision of Prof. Wei Li. He is interested in Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval and Language Generation. He got his bachelor degree from Hefei University of Technology.
summary: Rui Xing is currently working as a research assistant at Beihang University. Before this, he studied at Beihang University under the supervision of Prof. Wei Li. He is interested in Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval and Language Generation.
title: Rui Xing

content: 2019 IEEE International Conference on Bioinformatics and Biomedicine WorkShop on Biological Ontologies and Knowledge Bases
summary: 2019 IEEE International Conference on Bioinformatics and Biomedicine WorkShop on Biological Ontologies and Knowledge Bases
title: BioRel: A Large-Scale Dataset for Biomedical Relation Extraction
Distant Supervised Relation Extraction with Separate Head-Tail CNN

content: Proposed a new large-scale dataset, BioRel, for distant supervised relation extraction in biomedical domain. The dataset is created by aligning UMLS relations to Metamapped Medline Corpus.
summary: Proposed a new large-scale dataset, BioRel, for distant supervised relation extraction in biomedical domain. The dataset is created by aligning UMLS relations to Metamapped Medline Corpus.
title: Empirical Methods of Biomedical Knowledge Graph Construction

content: Designed separate head-tail CNN to alleviate mislabeling issue in distant supervised relation extraction. Proposed separate head-tail convolution and pooling to extract better semantic features, and classified relation from coarse-to-fine to alleviate impact of Not-A relation instances.
summary: Designed separate head-tail CNN to alleviate mislabeling issue in distant supervised relation extraction. Proposed separate head-tail convolution and pooling to extract better semantic features, and classified relation from coarse-to-fine to alleviate impact of Not-A relation instances.
title: Distant Supervised Relation Extraction

content: Introduced bootstrapping framework to extract binary relation in biomedical text, which discovered relational facts iteratively using entity pairs as seeds.
summary: Introduced bootstrapping framework to extract binary relation in biomedical text, which discovered relational facts iteratively using entity pairs as seeds.
title: Relation Extraction from Biomedical Text
